parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the current humidity value. 0 is no humidity and 1 is 100% humidity. Humidity value quickly changes from 0 to 1 when rain starts, then slowly changes from 1 to 0 when rain stops.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''humidity'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>currentHumidity = [[humidity]];
</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[skipTime]] -24;
86400 [[setOvercast]] 1;
[[skipTime]] 24;
[] [[spawn]] {
	10 [[setRain]] 1;
	[[sleep]] 10;
	10 [[setRain]] 0;
};
[[onEachFrame]] {
	[[hintSilent]] [[str]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[round]] ([[rain]] * 10) / 10, [[round]] ([[humidity]] * 10) / 10];
};
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[simulSetHumidity]], [[setOvercast]], [[setRain]], [[rain]], [[overcast]], [[fog]], [[wind]], [[waves]]
</value></part></template></root>
